publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5071.1 Derek Brownlee: The Scottish Economyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5071) in the name of John Swinney, insert at end "; further recognises the need to support existing and new businesses to create jobs; regrets the historic underperformance of the Scottish economy in new business creation; welcomes the positive and timely impact of the significant business rate reductions for small and medium-sized businesses and the Town Centre Regeneration Fund, and calls on the Scottish Government to work with all other levels of government and with the business community to do more to help raise the level of new business start-ups in Scotland."
